messages.title: FREE CHILDCARE AND A FAIRER ECONOMY
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have a bold plan to build a brighter future. We want to create a fairer economy where it's easier for you to be a parent, have a career, and provide for a family.

messages.title: TRANSFORMING MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES
messages.content: The NHS may not be the envy of the world, but our mental health service is certainly scraping a low on average. Just like for a fire or heart attack, Liberal Democrats want mental health emergencies to be taken seriously. We will also introduce a mental health rewards system to incentivise good work. Our plans will make for a brighter future for the millions of people who are treated with the same urgency as those with physical illnesses.

messages.title: The choice is simple
messages.content: Vote Liberal Democrat for a brighter future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plan to provide free childcare for children of working parents from 9 months old.
Transform mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour are out of the race

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats have a bold plan to build a brighter future. We want to create a fairer economy where it's easier for you to be a parent, have a career, and provide for a family.
issues.health: The NHS may not be the envy of the world, but our mental health service is certainly scraping a low on average.

endorsements.endorsement: Former Conservative member, switches to Lib Dem.

images.caption: Free childcare and a fairer economy.
The choice is simple. Vote Liberal Democrat for a brighter future.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Refers to Boris Johnson as the 'British Donald Trump'. Indicates a surge for the Liberal Democrats and claims Labour is out of the race.
